name: Mood Agent
description:
Here's a game i worked on during the Global Game Jam 2020.

In this game you are a super cute molecule whose purpose is to prevent your human's depression to take over. As you travel through various parts of the brain, you bring happiness back with smiles and colours.

I suggest you to play it with an Xbox Controller.

I worked on the game design and the level design. I also did a bit of programming.

You can see the origin page of the game here.

We've used Godot and Krita to make it.
